messages.body: $COP I don’t get this. To say I have loaded the boat on this would be an understatement. We’re talking Noah’s ark at this point and I still don’t see a reason that this should be going DOWN. Flat MAYBE as there is really no new demand and supply is still high, but Down? COP is diversified with an arsenal of goodies and still bleeds every day. I had to get back on stock twitz after a long hiatus because my wife is sick of me complaining to her about this so now I have to uphold my seemingly habitual loathing to you. Good luck folks. I’ll be baggholding well into the new year
